name.ja: <ruby>離<rt>ハナ</rt></ruby><ruby>世<rt>ヨ</rt></ruby><ruby>召<rt>メ</rt></ruby><ruby>人<rt>ニン</rt></ruby><ruby>形<rt>ギョウ</rt></ruby>

text.en: When you draw this card: You can reveal it; Special Summon it. At the start of the Battle Phase: If you have more cards in your Deck than your opponent does, this card gains ATK equal to the current difference x 300 until the end of this turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: Place this card on top of the Deck.
